issue.title: [Rust][Datafusion] DFParser should consume sql query as &str instead of String
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9124](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9124). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's more efficient to use &str instead of String

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9124?focusedCommentId=17135999) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7428
